DOC.brief_summary: The purpose project determine protein less likely create positive energy balance add diet compare carbohydrate . To , investigator take detailed measurement participant 's baseline metabolic rate understand energy requirement . Then , investigator fee participant meal two week , Monday-Friday , measure food intake . During one week-long feeding period , participant consume shake make egg protein ~20 % energy requirement . During week , participant consume shake make carbohydrate ~20 % energy requirement . Participants drink assigned shake begin daily three meal , offer 'regular ' meal unlimited quantity . Participants know investigator measure food consume drink shake . Participants drink protein shake first week carb-based shake second week , vice versa -- depend randomization order . To account energy expenditure , participant wear activity monitor , accelerometer . Energy balance , measure participant energy intake minus energy expenditure , main outcome treatment . However , participant may change behavior make aware true research question , investigator tell participant purpose study see low fiber high fiber shake affect mood . The hypothesis week participant consume protein shake , remain energy balance , week carbohydrate shake consumption , participant positive energy balance .
DOC.brief_title: The Role Protein Regulating Ad Libitum Energy Intake Humans
DOC.criteria: BMI ≥20 , ≤30 kg/m2 Moderately active sedentary ( Physical Activity Level < 2.0 ) Any food allergy . Religious affiliation include specific food guideline . Participation weightreduction program , weightloss diet , special diet within previous 3 month . Weight loss gain > 5 % body weight past 6 month reason except postpartum weight loss . Currently take medication suppresses stimulate appetite affect body weight , include oral antidiabetic medication . History prior surgical procedure weight control . Anyone currently take statin . Claustrophobia Current smoker quit smoke less 6 month prior . Any major disease , include : Active cancer cancer require treatment past 2 year ( except nonmelanoma skin cancer ) . Active chronic infection , include selfreported HIV positivity active tuberculosis . Active cardiovascular disease event include hospitalization therapeutic procedure treatment heart disease ( e.g. , coronary artery bypass , percutaneous transluminal coronary angioplasty ) past 6 month ; New York Heart Association Functional Class > 2 respect congestive heart failure ; stroke transient ischemic attack past 6 month . Gastrointestinal disease , include selfreported chronic hepatitis cirrhosis , episode alcoholic hepatitis alcoholic pancreatitis within past year , inflammatory bowel disease require treatment past year , recent significant abdominal surgery ( e.g. , gastrectomy ) . Active renal disease . Lung disease : chronic obstructive airway disease require use oxygen . Diagnosed diabetes ( type 1 2 ) . Uncompensated uncontrolled psychiatric disease ( schizophrenia bipolar disorder ) , opinion investigator , would impede conduct trial completion procedure . A score Brief Symptom Inventory ( BSI ) ( Derogatis & Melisaratos , 1983 ) exceed 90th percentile . History current eating disorder , Eating Attitudes Test ( EAT26 ) score > 20 . Conditions behavior likely effect conduct trial : unable unwilling give inform consent ; unable communicate pertinent clinic staff ; another household member participant staff member trial ; current anticipated participation another intervention research project would interfere intervention offer trial ; likely move away participate clinic trial complete ; unable walk 0.25 mile 10 minute . Currently take antidepressant , steroid , thyroid medication , unless dosage stable least 6 month . A recent ongoing problem drug abuse addiction . Excessive alcohol intake , either acute chronic , define one following : 1 ) average consumption 3 alcohol contain beverage daily ; 2 ) consumption 7 alcoholic beverage within 24hr period past 12 month ; 3 ) evidence available clinic staff . Pregnancy childbearing : currently pregnant less 3 month post partum ; currently nurse within 6 week complete nursing ; pregnancy anticipate study ; unwilling report possible confirm pregnancy promptly course trial ; unwilling take adequate contraceptive measure potentially fertile . Any condition , opinion investigator , would adversely affect conduct trial .
